question: Alex has 40 square meters of apple field. There are 72 apples per square meter. Alex can harvest his apples every 4 months. How many apples can Alex harvest within a year?
answer:
Alex has 72*40= <<72*40=2880>>2880 apples on his field.
Alex can harvest his apples 12 / 4 = <<12/4=3>>3 times per year
Therefore Alex can harvest 2880*3 = <<2880*3=8640>>8640 apples per year.
#### 8640
